message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the enthusiasm! I'm interested in the product, but $9000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be open to $8500?  That's my maximum budget at this time.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $8800. It's a fair compromise, and I think you'll still get a great deal.
